Question
========

Variables X and Y were measured in 50 individuals. The results were put into a scatterplot accompanied by the regression line of Y on X.\ When X increases by 20, Y will increase on average by:

![](uva-intercept-1224-nl-graph01.png)

Answerlist
----------

* 17
* 21
* 24
* 26

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 17: Incorrect
* 21: Incorrect
* 24: Correct
* 26: Incorrect
